risks.name: Telemetry Failure
risks.description: Heartbeat or sync telemetry stops updating.
risks.impact: Loss of visibility into system state.
risks.control: Telemetry health checks and Phase 3 enforcement.
risks.mitigation: Trigger safe mode if telemetry becomes invalid.

risks.name: Integrity Seal Break
risks.mitigation: Lock system and require governance approval.

risks.name: Unauthorised Runtime Execution
risks.description: Unapproved scripts executed in Node or PowerShell runtime.
risks.control: Controlled runtime directories and policy rules.

risks.name: External Integration Misuse
risks.description: External system attempts to exceed permitted access.
risks.mitigation: Deny access and trigger governance alert.

overallAssessment.summary: WyneOS v1.0 presents a low operational risk with strong governance, integrity controls, and telemetry validation.
overallAssessment.notes: All identified risks have active controls and mitigations.
